item.title: This week, the net inflow into the US Bitcoin Spot ETF was $5.476 billion.
item.description: August 16th. According to Farside Investors, during this week, the net inflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF was $547.6 million. Specifically, Belvedere IBIT witnessed a net inflow of $887.7 million, while FBTC had a net outflow of $73.8 million and ARKB had a net outflow of $183.9 million.

item.title: Trump Establishes "Corporate Loyalty List," Ranking 553 U.S. Businesses and Associations Based on Support for the "Big and Beautiful" Bill
item.description: On August 16th, as reported by The Daily Telegraph, White House officials have disclosed that Trump's aides have created a scorecard which ranks 553 American companies and industry associations according to their degree of support for the "Big and Beautiful" bill. A White House official stated that the list mainly measures how much effort American companies have made to back and promote the "Big and Beautiful" bill. Factors influencing the score include social media posts, press releases, video endorsements, advertisements, participation in White House events, and activities related to the "Big and Beautiful" bill.The list classifies companies as "high, medium, and low" partners of the bill. The American news website Axios has revealed that the list includes "excellent partner examples", such as Uber, DoorDash, United Airlines, Delta Air Lines, Airlines for America, AT&T, Cisco, and the American Iron and Steel Institute. These companies have all taken measures to promote Trump's "Big

item.title: In the past month, the supply of stablecoins on Ethereum has increased by $16.4 billion
item.description: On August 16th, based on Artemis data, the supply of stablecoins on Ethereum has witnessed a $16.4 billion increase over the past month.

item.title: Gate has launched OLAXBT (AIO) spot trading.
item.description: August 16th. According to an official announcement, Gate launched OLAXBT (AIO) spot trading at 23:00 on August 15th (in UTC+8 time zone).

item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」, who was long on ETH, has realized a loss of 4.99 million USD after reducing their position by 940,000 ETH. On the other hand, a certain whale who is short on ETH is currently f...
item.description: August 16th. Based on HyperInsight monitoring, in the past 30 minutes, the long position of "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng's ETH has decreased by $944,600. The current unrealized loss is approximately $4,992,900, and the liquidation price is $2,938.097. In addition, the whale with the address starting with 0x20c2d9 has reduced its short position of ETH by $801,100. The current unrealized loss is about $22,256,000, and the liquidation price is $6,072.198.

item.title: Somnia Gaming Entertainment Blockchain Project Airdrop Lookup Page
item.description: On August 16th, according to official channels, the game entertainment blockchain project Somnia has launched an airdrop query page. The eligibility criteria for receiving this initial airdrop consist of the following 3 aspects:1. The Authena Score is greater than 30;2. Have a specific Discord role or have already received SomniYaps;3. Own NFTs from specific ecosystems.

item.title: Opinion: Ethereum May See a ‘Massive’ Wave of Institutional Capital Post Japan-Korea Regulations
item.description: On August 16th, CNBC analyzed that the current rally in Ethereum is mainly driven by institutional purchases, and the institutions mainly come from the United States. Meanwhile, it is crucial to note that Asia is embracing Ethereum, with Japan and South Korea being significant crypto markets in Asia. A "substantial" institutional capital wave may be set off in these markets after the introduction of new regulations.

item.title: A certain Ethereum ICO participation address moved all of its 334.7 ETH after 10 years of dormancy, resulting in a 14,269x ROI.
item.description: On August 16th, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, an Ethereum ICO participant named '0x61b9', who had been silent for more than 10 years, transferred all 334.7 ETH (equivalent to 1.48 million USD) today. He had only invested $104 in the ICO and received 334.7 ETH - now worth 1.48 million USD, resulting in a return of 14,269 times.

item.title: Binance: Alpha Airdrop Available Today at 4:00 PM, 200 Points Threshold
item.description: August 16th. According to an official announcement, users who hold at least 200 Alpha Points are eligible to claim the Binance Alpha airdrop at 16:00 (UTC+8) today. The specific details of the project have not been disclosed yet.

item.title: Jupiter: $5.8 Billion SOL in JLP Pool to be Staked, Rewards Allocated to JLP Holders
item.description: August 16. According to official information, Jupiter is going to stake up to $5.8 billion worth of SOL in the JLP liquidity pool by using the native staking mechanism. This will convert staking rewards into more value for JLP holders.
